mapper.insert: insert into users values(#{id}, #{pass}, #{nick}, #{email}, 0, null, #{lastlog}, #{ban, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select: select users.id, users.email, users.pass, users.lv, users.photo COUNT(*) as count from users where id = #{id} group by users.id, users.pass, users.email, users.lv, users.photo
